description: Migrates CloudFormation resources in to nested stacks in order to work around the 200 resource limit.

SplitStacks.description: Configuration for split stacks plugin. Please make sure to install the [serverless-plugin-split-stacks](https://www.serverless.com/plugins/serverless-plugin-split-stacks) package and add to plugins.

nestedStackCount.description: Controls the number of created nested stacks

stackConcurrency.description: Controls if enabled and how much stacks are deployed in parallel. Disabled if absent.

resourceConcurrency.description: Controls how much resources are deployed in parallel. Disabled if absent.

custom.description: If you want to pass path to your splitter directly
